message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
Alice, your product is interesting, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $10,500.
